duties_responsibilities.duty: Observe and document ECG rhythms and notify the responsible nurse of any changes in cardiac rhythm or rate.
Respond to monitor alarms immediately and report any changes to the team leader or nurse caring for the patient.
Collaborate with the patient care team to achieve quality patient outcomes.
Inform the Charge Nurse of any equipment malfunctions so repairs can be completed as needed.
Contribute to the teamwork essential for ensuring quality patient care.
Promote consistent, positive patient interactions and provide a safe patient environment.
